notificationOpenWindowError.message: Failed to open a new window. $ERROR$

notificationDataUriError.message: Can't search the image unsupported format(Data URI).

notificationDownloadLanguageError.message: Failed to download a language list.

htmlLinkageMessage.message: Click the upper right button, Wiktionary linkage is enabled. Select a text, the text will be automatically sent to Wiktionary to search, even if it includes your privacy information like a password. So use carefully. I recommend that you disable it, when you don't need it.

htmlMaxLengthLimitation.message: Don't search for the text larger than $ERROR$ bytes.

htmlParseFailed.message: Failed to parse. Displayed the original text.

htmlMeaningNotFound.message: Failed to do the "Display only meaning" function because there is not a description of the meaning. Displayed the original text.

htmlSectionNotFound.message: Failed to do the "Language filter" function because there is not a matching language. Displayed without filtering.

htmlConnectionError.message: Failed to connect to the server. $ERROR$

htmlServerError.message: Got an error from the server. $ERROR$

htmlApplicationError.message: Got an error from the application. $ERROR$

htmlFormDescription.message: Click the "Select some links to add" button, you can add some links from the list. Input "$$1" in the URL field, the "$$1" will be replaced to a selected text.

htmlPresetDescription.message: Select some links and press the "Add" button. Then it's added.

htmlLabelDescription.message: Input a site name. It's displayed on the widget or the context menu.

htmlUrlDescription.message: Input a URL. "$$1" will be replaced to the selected text.

alertHistoryAllDelete.message: All the history items will be deleted. It contains the history items which aren't displayed on the table below.

htmlHistoryDescription.message: The history data are saved into the PC. They are not in scope of browser synchronization service. You can change configuration to save history or not on the "Link edit" menu.

htmlHistoryZeroRowMessage.message: The number of the history items is 0.

htmlRankingDescription.message: By using the history data, this function aggregates the number of searches for each selected text. If you delete some of the history items, the number of searches decreases too. Find out your weakness of words from the results, and study efficiently.

htmlRankingZeroRowMessage.message: The number of the history items is 0.

htmlDisplayFunctionDescription.message: Select how to display widget automatically or manually after selecting text.

htmldomainListDescription.message: When a domain matches the list below, the  widget can be displayed. To enable, select the "Enable for the allowed domains" check on the "Widget startup" menu.

htmlNoneDomainAllowedDescription.message: There are not any allowed domains.

notificationDomainLengthError.message: The domain lenght is limited to $LENGTH$ bytes or less.

notificationDomainListSizeError.message: The number of the domain list is limited to $SIZE$ items maximum.

htmlLinkListActionMouseover.message: Display widget by mousing over the icon.

htmlLinkListActionMouseclick.message: Display widget by clicking the icon.

htmlLinkListSeparatorTitle.message: Separator between links and Wiktionary linkage

htmlApiServiceDescription.message: Wiktionary is a sister site of Wikipedia. It's a dictionary site where volunteers post articles. By connecting to Wiktionary, the description of a word is displayed on the widget.

htmlServiceCodeDescription.message: The displayed language and the quality of a content are different for each of the hosts. Change this, "Language filter" needs additional setting. Select "Disable", the area of Wiktionary linkage is hidden.

htmlLanguageFilterDescription.message: Wiktionary is a multilingual dictionary. The articles include some descriptions of various languages. Using "Language filter" is that display some descriptions of the languages you specified.

htmlLanguageFilterAside.message: For example, "four" means "4 " in English, but in French it means "oven, furnace". If you select "English" for "Language filter", only "4" will be displayed.

htmlLanguageFilterDownloadMessage.message: Now downloading a list of languages from Wiktionary

htmlApiCutOutDescription.message: Display only the meaning except for the descriptions of pronunciation, etc.

htmlIssueDescription.message: Use for bug reports, suggestions, questions, etc. The posts will be open to the public.

htmlIam.message: Ryosuke Ohta (太田亮介), Freelance programmer, in Tokyo Japan.

htmlLicenseDescription.message: This software is released under the MIT License.

htmlCheckByteLengthError.message: Shorten to $MAX_LENGTH$ bytes or less (Currently $LENGTH$ bytes).

htmlCheckFieldLengthError.message: The number of links is limited to $MAX_FIELDS$ items maximum.

htmlCheckPresetLengthError.message: The number of links is limited to $MAX_FIELDS$ items maximum. It is set to $SUM$ items. Currently $CHECKED$ items are selected. You can select $REMAINING$ items.

htmlCheckLanguageFilterByteLengthError.message: The number of the character of language filte is limited to $LENGTH$ bytes or less.

htmlCheckLanguageFilterLengthError.message: The number of language filter is limited to $MAX$ items maximum.
